locations: South Lake Tahoe, California, USA::(Big Air Snowboard Episodes)
imdb.plot outline: Trending Gold: A New Virtual Reality Series by Olympic Channel and Jaunt. Experience the thrills and spills of being a top Winter Olympic hopeful first-hand in immersive 3D 360 virtual reality. Join world class athletes including Olympic Gold Medal winner Jamie Anderson and Olympic Silver Medalist Max Parrot, along with the world famous Nigerian Bobsleigh team as they train around the world, preparing for the 2018 Winter Olympic Games in Pyeongchang, South Korea.
imdb.title: Trending Gold - Olympic Channel
